# JohnCodes (John Oluwafemi)

> JohnCodes is the personal portfolio of John, a highly-rated full-stack web developer based in Nigeria with international clients in Canada, the UK, and the US. Specialises in MERN/React development, business websites, eCommerce stores, appointment/booking systems, and NGO websites.

Key notes:
- Primary focus: eCommerce + Booking systems + SaaS dashboards
- Notable projects: Cepher (NGO site), NJSH (Journal), Mcken Beauty (Booking website)
- Location: Nigeria (serves global clients)

## Portfolio
- [Home / Portfolio](https://johncodes.xyz/): Overview, featured projects, client testimonials.
- [Projects](https://johncodes.xyz/projects): Individual project pages with case studies and tech stack.
- [Cepher (NGO)](https://cepher.org.ng): NGO site example with donations/contact flow.
- [NJSH (Journal)](https://njsh.org.ng): Academic journal site built with OJS and custom integrations.

## About & Services
- [About](https://johncodes.xyz/about): Skills, background, industries served, experience.
- [Services](https://johncodes.xyz/case-studies): eCommerce development, booking systems, website migrations, performance optimisation.

## Contact & Hiring
- [Contact](https://johncodes.xyz#contact): Contact form and WhatsApp CTA.
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/johnmoyinoluwa): Professional profile and references.
